channel.title: 2 Little simple noobie problems with Easy RSC
channel.description:
Hey, Btw, good work on this project.
[b]First problem.[/b] I can't seem to compile my server.
This is the error I get everytime:
[URL=http://img216.imageshack.us/i/buga.png/][IMG]http://img216.imageshack.us/img216/7707/buga.png[/img][/URL]
This is what it looks like when you "Right Click" and go on "EDIT"
[URL=http://img219.imageshack.us/i/bugtqe.png/][IMG]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/6444/bugtqe.png[/img][/URL]
* I do have JDK
[b]Second Problem:[/b]
I cant get anyone else from other computers to connect to my server. I tried messing with "no-ip" but that didn't work.
Can anyone just layout a few steps to fix these noobie problems ? :|
Can't take to long to explain.
P.S. I looked around for tut's but did not manage to find any.
Thanks :)

item.title: 2 Little simple noobie problems with Easy RSC
item.dc:creator: @dimmu_borgir dimmu borgir
item.description:
@dimmu_borgir wrote:

If the “taskkill not found” does bother you that much, you can always delete it from the .bat file. I did the same, and it compiles successfully (or should I say, works properly. It doesn’t always compile successfully, but that’s a different story :P).

Read full topic
item.source: 2 Little simple noobie problems with Easy RSC

item.title: 2 Little simple noobie problems with Easy RSC
item.dc:creator: @parkview parkview
item.description:
@parkview wrote:

Hey, thanks for the help. I followed the Compiling tut and now I get this error:

taskkill not reconized?

This is what it looks like when you “Right Click” and go on “EDIT”

Thanks :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 14, 2009, 04:18:52 pm[/size][hr]Well I fixed it. I managed to mess around with a couple settings and it worked. Thanks for taking the time to read and help me ;D

Cya, Topic closed

Read full topic
